column2: Hold SHIFT and right-click drag to draw a movement path for your selection to follow.
Also selects the previous entity while in cinematic mode.
Also selects the next entity while in cinematic mode.
Holding ALT as artillery will enter manual aiming mode allowing to select an area to fire at.
Hold CTRL while giving a drag order to make the selected unit(s) walk to the destination.
Hold LALT while right-click dragging to drag selection in direction pulled, while maintaining their dimensions.
Hold RALT while right-click dragging to drag selection using point clicked as centre front for dragout.
You can cancel giving an order/drag move before releasing the mouse button, by pressing escape or pressing the alternate mouse button.
Hold CTRL and double left-click on a unit to select all units of that type.
Holding ALT and right-clicking on an enemy unit will force a melee attack while not in melee mode.
Hold SHIFT while selecting units on the battlefield to select all units between previous selection to newest selection. This is useful for selecting long lines of units.
Holding ALT, you can left-click drag your selection to tweak their location while maintaining their relative positioning. Hold CTRL while doing so to rotate the selection.
